title: [French-Bread] Gleam of force
description:
Gleam of Force
by French-Bread

+ Installation files (iso)
+ Serial Code
+ Patches

Gleam of Force is a doujin boxing game released by French Bread in 2008. It is a sequel to Glove on Fight, but uses an updated engine and a completely original cast.

-----

Hello fighting game fans! If you travel to a lot of east coast american anime / video game conventions, you've probably seen this game being played. I've got everything packaged here for you to install, play, and enjoy on your home computers. Get some practice in and come challenge me at the next convention! FIGHT ON!

Recommendations:

+ If you do not have a USB controller, search for "PS2 to USB" adapters. They are cheap and easy to find online.

~Raxion
